faq.question: How to use this Annexure
faq.answer: Let's walk you through the tabs listed at the bottom of this sheet.

faq.question: Payout Invoice
faq.answer: The payout summary gives you an overall breakup of your payout with specific breakup of your earnings, fees and deductions.

faq.question: All Orders
faq.answer: You can see the the breakup of your earnings at an order level.

faq.question: Discounts P&L
faq.answer: This is where you can look at the financial breakup of the discounts which were used by your customers in this payout period.

faq.question: Adjustment Details
faq.answer: This is where you can see the breakup & details about the adjustments made from your weekly payout

faq.question: FAQ/Glossary
faq.answer: If you have any queries on the payout, you can look at the most frequently asked questions. Also contains a glossary of the terms used in this annexure.
